content:
3(5)-Methyl-5(3)-phenyl-1H-1,2,4-triazole was prepared by a literature method [24]. All other reagents are commercially available and were used as received.

Preparation of [Ag(3-Me-5-Ph-tzH)<sub>2</sub>]NO<sub>3</sub>·3H<sub>2</sub>O (<bold>1</bold>)

An ethanol solution (2 mL) of 3-Me-5-Ph-tzH (0.2 mmol, 32 mg) was layered on the surface of an aqueous solution of AgNO3 (0.2 mmol, 34 mg) in a test tube. Colorless crystals of 1 were obtained in 60% yield within several days.

C18H24N7AgO6 (542.31) Found C 39.8, H 4.5, N 18.0; Calcd. C 39.9, H 4.5, N 18.1.

Preparation of [Ag(3-Me-5-Ph-tz)]<sub>n</sub> (<bold>2</bold>)

A solution containing AgNO3 (0.1 mmol, 17 mg) and 25% aqueous ammonia (2 mL) was mixed with a methanol solution (4 mL) of 3-Me-5-Ph-tzH (0.1 mmol, 16 mg). The resulting mixture was allowed to evaporate slowly for 1 month to yield colorless sheets of 2. Yield: 65%.

C9H8AgN3 (266.05) Found C 40.8, H 2.6, N 15.6; Calcd. C 40.6, H 3.0, N 15.8. IR (KBr pellet, cm−1): 3,062 w, 1,631 m, 1,467 s, 1,435 s, 1,406 s, 1,336 m, 1,279 w, 1,074 w, 1,005 m, 916 w, 779 m, 742 s, 695 s, 535 w.
clean_text:
3(5)-Methyl-5(3)-phenyl-1H-1,2,4-triazole was prepared by a literature method [24]. All other reagents are commercially available and were used as received.

Preparation of [Ag(3-Me-5-Ph-tzH)2]NO3⋅3H2O (1)

An ethanol solution (2 mL) of 3-Me-5-Ph-tzH (0.2 mmol, 32 mg) was layered on the surface of an aqueous solution of AgNO3 (0.2 mmol, 34 mg) in a test tube. Colorless crystals of 1 were obtained in 60% yield within several days.

C18H24N7AgO6 (542.31) Found C 39.8, H 4.5, N 18.0; Calcd. C 39.9, H 4.5, N 18.1.

Preparation of [Ag(3-Me-5-Ph-tz)]n (2)

A solution containing AgNO3 (0.1 mmol, 17 mg) and 25% aqueous ammonia (2 mL) was mixed with a methanol solution (4 mL) of 3-Me-5-Ph-tzH (0.1 mmol, 16 mg). The resulting mixture was allowed to evaporate slowly for 1 month to yield colorless sheets of 2. Yield: 65%.

C9H8AgN3 (266.05) Found C 40.8, H 2.6, N 15.6; Calcd. C 40.6, H 3.0, N 15.8. IR (KBr pellet, cm-1): 3,062 w, 1,631 m, 1,467 s, 1,435 s, 1,406 s, 1,336 m, 1,279 w, 1,074 w, 1,005 m, 916 w, 779 m, 742 s, 695 s, 535 w.
